title: 求教刷怪箱代码
author: 月与空
txt_content: 小白刷怪箱代码  凋零骷髅刷怪箱代码  僵尸猪人刷怪箱代码  版本是1.12.2  要和野外自动生成的刷怪箱一样的

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
setblock ~ ~ ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:zombie"},SpawnPotentials:[{Entity:{id:"minecraft:zombie"},Weight:1}]}复制代码

把zombie换成skeleton、wither_skeleton、zombie_pigman就是骷髅、凋灵骷髅、僵尸猪人了
